title: OneOdio proves you don’t need to spend a fortune for DJ-quality audio
author: sponsored
article: In a world where high-end audio quality means ultra-expensive products, OneOdio is bucking that trend. With over 10 years of experience in making audio products, OneOdio is committed to making products that don’t just sound amazing, but are affordable and accessible for everyone.

If you’re a budding DJ just starting out, or a music fan that wants to hear your favorite tunes in the highest possible fidelity, you may have found yourself priced out of buying high-end headphones in the past. OneOdio aims to change that by striking the perfect balance between high-quality headphones and affordable prices, bringing the power of music to everyone.

Take the OneOdio A70 Bluetooth and Wired headphones. For day-to-day use you can pair them wirelessly with your smartphone via Bluetooth, and with an upgraded playtime of 72 hours (up from 50), you can keep on listening without worrying about charging them.

Thanks to its 40nm speakers and extra bass, your music will sound fantastic as well. For DJs and music professionals, you can also use the OneOdio A70 wired, with 6.35mm and 3.5mm jacks, so there’s no need for an adapter.

These headphones have been designed for long listening sessions in maximum comfort, with the earcans using memory-protein that disperses pressure and heat, so you can wear these for hours on end. Each ear cup also swivels 90 degrees, and a jack lock system ensures they don’t get damaged if the wire is accidentally pulled or caught.

Best of all, they are far more affordable than many headsets that claim to offer a similar level of sound quality and comfort, so it’s easy to see why OneOdio’s reputation around the world is growing.
The OneOdio A70 is available from both Amazon US and Amazon UK, as well as from OneOdio.com.
If you shop with OneOdio.com, you’ll get benefits such as exclusive buy one get one free and 50% off deals, as well as free shipping - making these headsets even better value.
